name: Kamen Rider: Battride War Genesis
description:
Kamen Rider: Battride War Genesis is an action game developed by Bandai Namco Entertainment and Eighting. It came out on 25-02-2016. It was published by Bandai Namco Entertainment. The game is rated as "Recommended" on RAWG.
You can play Kamen Rider: Battride War Genesis on PlayStation 3, PS Vita and PlayStation 4.
